name: AltarChase
description:
You are an adventurer that has heard a legend of a dungeon that holds a priceless artifact. You enter the dungeon and feel it tremble as the entrance closes behind you. you are now trapped, and the only way to escape is to collect the artifact and get to the exit before the other explorers who happened to have the exact same idea as you.

Pick up potions to increase your speed and drop traps to hinder your rivals. Pick up the artifact and head to the escape rope to win the game.

Level Customization:

Each game is set in a procedurally generated dungeon. The size of the dungeon among other settings can be chosen by the host before the game begins.

How To Connect:

To connect to other players' games, you should use LogMeIn Hamachi, and connect to their network. Once you are in and the host has clicked the host game button, use the host's ipv4 address to connect to the game.

Controls:

  • WASD - Walk around.
  • E - turn your light off (good for hiding).
  • Space - drop traps. Traps will stop other players for a few seconds and cause them to drop the artifact if they are holding it.
